aka: Dolly Kitty and Those Twinkling Stars

cast.name: 康柯纳·森·沙尔玛 Konkona Sen Sharma
布米·佩德卡尔 Bhumi Pednekar
维金兰特·马西 Vikrant Massey

writer.name: 阿兰克里塔·什里瓦斯塔瓦 Alankrita Shrivastava

director.name: 阿兰克里塔·什里瓦斯塔瓦 Alankrita Shrivastava

this_title: Dolly kitty aur woh chamakte sitare
trans_title: 人前叫多莉，人后叫凯蒂
Dolly Kitty and Those Twinkling Stars
introduction: A story about Dolly’s and Kazal’s secrets, two cousins, who live in the suburbs of New Delhi. Dolly lives as a middle-class housewife, but she has to hide some secrets to lead her life. Under the name ‘Kitty’, Kazal meets a man while playing the role of a cyber-lover.
chinese_title: 人前叫多莉，人后叫凯蒂
foreign_title: Dolly kitty aur woh chamakte sitare
